comment.author: 9743588@N08
comment._content: Sheep jam.  No wonder I can't fall asleep...the sheep are on strike!

comment.author: 26602074@N06
comment._content: Even the road sides look bare, there is one black sheep, a sheep dog and a ram looks at the camera. The two women shepherds wear white aprons over their long dark dresses and have a horse and sulky for their meagre supplies. There is writing on the fence rail behind the woman on the right - something like Cohen & Levy's.
